document_data.name: ''Ring of Hiding''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Rings of hiding''''' were [[enchanted]] [[ring]]s that enhanced the wearer's [[rogue|roguish]] skills.
document_data.Description: They were [[leather]] bands that were tanned to be of vaguely the same color as the wearer's finger so as to be unnoticed when worn.
document_data.Powers: The ring's magic allowed the wearer to blend into the background with ease, avoid detection, and hide with increased proficiency.
document_data.History: By the {{YearlinkName|1372}}, ''rings of hiding'' were a piece of common equipment worn by rogues, [[thief|thieves]], and individuals of similar professions. Their usefulness also made such rings an increasingly popular piece of equipment worn by the infamous [[Night Masks]] of [[Westgate]] if the [[City Watch (Westgate)|City Watch]] there was to be believed.
document_data.Notable Owners: * [[Dela Nereth]], a member of the [[Bloodsailors]] gang of Neverwinter in 1372 DR.
